name: Matti's Nightmare
description:
Matti is lost in nightmares! He cannot escape and wake up before he has collected all the treasures in the surrealistic world he is trapped in.  There are monsters and creatures from the best dreams and worst nightmares on the way.

This is a platform game with 80ies ZX Spectrum style graphics. The style is surrealistic as in Manic Miner and Jet Set Willy. The game is made for the Pokitto DIY retro gaming device https://www.pokitto.com.
